alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 6:40PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jewell, east central Smith and southwestern Nuckolls Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 640 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Esbon, or 31 miles northwest of Beloit, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Esbon around 645 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Burr Oak, Mankato and Montrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
